public class Company_Rest_Facade
extends java.lang.Object

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createCoupon(Coupon coupon, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method get coupon bean from the user and save it in the database .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllCoupons(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give the details of all the company coupons to the company user .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCoupon(long id, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give the coupon details to the company.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCouponByEndDate(java.sql.Date date, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give the details of the company coupons from specific end-date and before .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCouponByPrice(double price, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give the details of the company coupons from the price the user choose and lower .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCouponByType(CouponType type, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give the details of company coupons of specific type to the company user .
      void logOut(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      to make shore that no one is using the facade directly with the url (without login first) we put the facade on the session in the log in and remove it in the log out (the filter will stop users without facade on there session).
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> removeCoupon(Coupon coupon, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method get coupon bean from the user and remove it from the database .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateCoupon(Coupon coupon, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method get coupon bean from the user and update only the end date and the price .

        @RequestMapping(value="/coupon/company/logOut",
                method=DELETE)
 @ResponseBody
